dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5111 IH: To improve the response to victims of child sex trafficking.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Beatty introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To improve the response to victims of child sex trafficking.

section.header: Response to victims of child sex trafficking
section.text: Section 404(b)(1)(P)(iii) of the Missing Childrenâ€™s Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 5773(b)(1)(P)(iii)) is amended by striking child prostitution and inserting child sex trafficking.
